Package com.example.orange.data.model

Class User

java.lang.Object
com.example.orange.data.model.User
public class User extends Object
Represents a user in the application. This class contains user information and methods for managing user data.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    User()
    Default constructor required for Firestore.
    User(String deviceId, UserType userType)
    Constructs a new User with specified username and user type.

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User()
      Default constructor required for Firestore. Initializes empty lists for events.

    • User

      public User(String deviceId, UserType userType)
      Constructs a new User with specified username and user type.
      Parameters:
      deviceId - The deviceId of the user.
      userType - The type of the user (e.g., ENTRANT, ORGANIZER, ADMIN).
